text: Emmanuel Paga (born 28 July 1999) is a Ghanaian footballer, who plays as a Centre forward for Ghanaian football club Vision. == Career == Born in Accra, Paga played with FC 2015 in 2011-2012. Since 2012, he became part of the main team of Nadm Soccer Club.https://www.bigdsoccer.com/fc-dallas-transfer-news- rumors/2018/6/24/17499392/european-clubs-fc-dallas-academy-player-emmanuel- paga During the winter of 2017 season, he moved to the United States of America and joined FC Dallas Academy U18/19.http://www.madeinfoot.com/joueur/emmanuel- paga-507739.htmlhttps://www.fcdallas.com/post/2017/11/22/academy-fc-dallas- academy-embraces-diversity === San Antonio FC === In 2019, Paga joined USL Championship side San Antonio FC on a year deal. He later joined Ghanaian club Inter Allies on a short stint. === Vision FC === In January 2020, Paga joined Ghanaian divisional club Vision FC on a year deal. ==References== ==External links== * * *USSF Development Academy bio Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Ghanaian footballers Category:Ghanaian expatriate footballers Category:USL Championship players Category:Association football forwards Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Ghanaian expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:San Antonio FC players
title: Emmanuel Paga
